title: Last Breath
description: A deep-sea saturation diver becomes trapped 100 meters underwater without oxygen after his umbilical cable is severed, leading to a miraculous survival story.

title: The Social Dilemma
description: Tech experts reveal how social media platforms manipulate users by exploiting human psychology, leading to addiction, misinformation, and societal harm.

title: Hot Girls Wanted
description: An intimate look into the lives of young women entering the amateur porn industry, exploring the exploitation and challenges they face.

title: The Great Hack
description: Investigates the Facebook–Cambridge Analytica data scandal, revealing how personal data was used to influence political outcomes.

title: Inside Job
description: An in-depth look at the 2008 global financial crisis, examining the unethical practices and systemic corruption that led to the economic collapse.
